title: Currently Working On
synopsis: Here is a list of [[Recent Changes]] I consider important. View our experiments on the [[Scratch]] page. To clear stuff saved in your browser try [[Local Changes]].

title: Scripts and Handlers
synopsis: Here we list open source [[Livecode Scripts]] that are available as part of [[Livecode World]].

title: Welcome Visitors
synopsis: Welcome to a [[Federated Wiki]] site about [[Scripts and Handlers]] in the [[World of Livecode]]. Here we list code, tests and documentation about handlers and short [[Standalone Scripts]] in the [[LiveScript]].
